appBar.description: Provides configuration to the main app toolbar. If not supplied, the all default appbar controls are displayed. To completely hide the toolbar, provide the following: { sideMenu: false, geoSearch: false, layers: false }.

sideMenu.description: Shows the side menu button in the main app toolbar.

geoSearch.title: Geo Search

basemap.description: Shows the basemap selector button in the main app toolbar.

layers.description: Shows the layers button in the main app toolbar.
